titles.title: A bill to authorize to be appropriated to the Defense Logistics Agency for fiscal year 2009 $14,400,000 to replace fuel storage tanks at Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1528)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
3/4/2008--Introduced.
Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to replace fuel storage tanks at Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico, using amounts authorized to be appropriated for FY2009 under this Act.
